featured.text: They have a short lifespan for insects.
What did Alfred and Anthony have in common? (A) Lifespan.

definition.zh_def: 生命週期或生物體存在的時間長度。
definition.en_def: The duration of time that an organism or entity is expected to live.
definition.example: The average lifespan of a dog is around 10 to 15 years.
